attributes.action: Reinstate Sir Kim Darroch as US ambassador.
attributes.background: By allowing The US to force the resignation of Sir Kim, we debase and insult our diplomatic service at a time we need it most. We must defend honesty and the courage to speak truth to power (even when it is a tough message), otherwise we surrender our values, dignity and self respect as a nation.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments this includes petitions asking for people to be given a job.
